title: Ellipsis
description:
Gods, heartbreak, and magic.
Passed down through generations, a creator’s stone was given to Weaver Rizer. A gift that brings pain but also a gift that could save his world. Only downside, it’s now embedded into his skin.All the experiences and trials Weaver faces lead him to the truth. He is only meant to deliver the stone to another. The leader of a rebellion fighting against the crown. But nothing works as it should. With the help of mages, princes, a new-found love and childhood friends, he attempts to keep a vengeful god from waking. But as Weaver sees his goal within reach, the god of Ellipsis himself gives Weaver a warning. Every step he takes is one step closer to his death.
If you’re a fan of the Throne of Glass by Sarah J. Maas Then you’re sure to enjoy this new imaginative world created by Jacob L. White.

Get into the adventure now. Buy Ellipsis and don’t miss this debut series.
author: Jacob L. White
